quest.name: Into the Wood
journal: Y'shtola would waste no time in heading to Yx'Maja.
Y'shtola rushes off to Slitherbough to inform the others preparations to enter Yx'Maja are complete. Once rested, she bids you join them at the cave that leads out to the east of Slitherbough.
With the seal of Ronka in hand, weapons at the ready, you and the Scions set out into Yx'Maja in search of the Ronkan ruins and their protectors.

As you wend your way through Yx'Maja, you are suddenly assailed by arrows from the trees. As arrows continue to rain from above, one of three figures jumps down and begins a vicious assault against Y'shtola. It is only after Urianger interrupts the lancer's onslaught that she finds an opportunity to present them with the seal of Ronka. The attack stops almost immediately. The lancer confirms the seal appears to be genuine, but her counterparts towering above in the trees are not yet certain. They invite you to follow the trail of azure flowers to their village. There they will decide if you are friend or foe.

Upon closer examination, their leader, Almet, recognizes the authenticity of your seal and welcomes you as allies of Ronka. It appears your arrival is long awaited, but to what end remains yet to be seen.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Bearing this seal, it should be possible to enter Yx'Maja unmolested by its guardians.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: I will go ahead to Slitherbough and inform the others. When you have recovered from your exertions, meet with us in the cavern leading east out of the village.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: We've done what we can to prepare them for the worst.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Still, we should hurry, before the Children return with Eulmoran reinforcements.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: I'm so glad to see you're safe. Everyone is ready to go if you are.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: That you all found the seal is perhaps bittersweet proof that the aid for which it was so painstakingly forged never came.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Thus did the empire crumble, its ruins reclaimed by the wood. Fate is ever a fickle mistress.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Good, you're here. Runar opened the gate for us but moments ago.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Beyond lies Yx'Maja, and presumably the Lightwarden.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: It did not take long for the wood's protectors to find me when last I came here, and I expect them to fall upon us just as quickly this time.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Though we carry the seal, that is no reason for us to let down our guard.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Now, let us seek out the Warden, and put an end to its reign over these woods.

dialogue.name: UIMET
dialogue.text: Good to see you didn't lose your way.

dialogue.name: CYMET
dialogue.text: You outsiders are a strange lot, aren't you?

dialogue.name: ALMET
dialogue.text: (-Bow-wielding Sentinel-)I would have the seal, that we may confirm its authenticity.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Straight to the point, I see. Very well.

dialogue.name: ALMET
dialogue.text: (-Bow-wielding Sentinel-)Hmmm. There is no mistaking the crest of the royal family.

dialogue.name: ALMET
dialogue.text: (-Bow-wielding Sentinel-)It is of proper size, and by its weight it is plain it was made from gold. The seal is indeed genuine.

dialogue.name: ALMET
dialogue.text: (-Bow-wielding Sentinel-)For three thousand years we have waited for this moment, and now you are finally here. I bid you welcome, allies of Ronka.

dialogue.name: ALMET
dialogue.text: (-Almet-)I am Almet, chieftainess of Fanow.

dialogue.name: UIMET
dialogue.text: Uimet, her younger sister.

dialogue.name: CYMET
dialogue.text: Cymet. A pleasure. We were beginning to lose hope that you would come.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: I beg your pardon?

dialogue.name: ALMET
dialogue.text: (-Almet-)These are troubled times for my people.

dialogue.name: ALMET
dialogue.text: (-Almet-)Though I can but imagine what has compelled you to venture into our woods.

dialogue.name: ALMET
dialogue.text: (-Almet-)You must be tired after your journey. Come, take your ease.

dialogue.name: UIMET
dialogue.text: If you'd like I will show you about the village. Though I must warn you it is a long way down to the forest floor, so do watch your step.
